category.name: Global Services.Options
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_gms_server_ca_path
preference.preference_description: Specifies the path to the directory with trusted certificates of the Certificate Authorities (CAs) for servers including Global Services server. This preference is applicable only when the Global Services is deployed in HTTPS mode. The value of this preference is optional and can be left blank if server certificate validation is not required.
